message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $120. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your perspective, Bob, but $120 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $100?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $100. Would you be willing to meet me at $85?
